resources.string: This app allows you to easily open the built-in service menu for Sony Xperia devices.\n\nThe service menu can be used to test the various components of the device, retrieve device information and retrieve/set configuration parameters.
ERROR: Unable to get device model name
Do not use this app if you are unsure of what you are doing. ThunderboltSoft will not be responsible for any damage that may occur to your phone as a result of improper use of the service menu.
